title: Face Recognition Dataset
description: Facial recognition dataset with labeled face images across multiple identities for face recognition and verification systems.
full_description: This dataset contains labeled face images with multiple images per identity, various poses, lighting conditions, and expressions. Perfect for face recognition, face verification, and biometric authentication systems.
